channel.title: Help with Servers?
channel.description: Ok, so I am brand new to Moparscape, and I would just like to know how to join someone elses server. I've gone to the serverstatus page and clicked on a server, but it only takes me to my Hybridscape (or something). I've looked around the forums and I can't seem to find a tutorial about what I need, so please direct me to a tutorial, or just tell me please. And no, I don't want to make my own server, so please don't direct me to that tutorial. Thank you!

item.title: Help with Servers?
item.dc:creator: @p_e_e_p_z_i p e e p z i
item.description:
@p_e_e_p_z_i wrote:

Go to client.silabsoft.org wait a while for it to load then go to http://moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php then you’ll see a list of servers click on one and find the ip adress for example 12345pk.no-ip.org you’ll see ip: on the client just type that in choose a name then log in.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with Servers?
item.dc:creator: @vrac_defiled vrac defiled
item.description:
@vrac_defiled wrote:

ry60003333:

You idiot you click the server, the client loads, and you hit Existing User. Why the heck do you hit start server.

Hes new to mopar dont be so harsh with him…

Read full topic

item.title: Help with Servers?
item.dc:creator: @mopar_user mopar user
item.description:
@mopar_user wrote:

Download moparscape: http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,6915.0.html

Then you put the server ip that you find on the server status page in the spot that says ip, put your username and password and there you go.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 21, 2008, 12:26:12 pm[/size][hr][quote=“ry60003333, post:2, topic:227319”]You idiot you click the server, the client loads, and you hit Existing User. Why the heck do you hit start server.[/quote]

take it easy he said this is his first time.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with Servers?
item.dc:creator: @O_I_Owned_U O__I_Owned_U
item.description:
@O_I_Owned_U wrote:

Ok, so I am brand new to Moparscape, and I would just like to know how to join someone elses server. I’ve gone to the serverstatus page and clicked on a server, but it only takes me to my Hybridscape (or something). I’ve looked around the forums and I can’t seem to find a tutorial about what I need, so please direct me to a tutorial, or just tell me please. And no, I don’t want to make my own server, so please don’t direct me to that tutorial. Thank you!
